equation:
\begin{equation}
\tilde{s} (p) \equiv - \eta + (1 - K(p))
\left( \frac{\ep m^2}{p^2 + m^2} + \eta \right)  + K(p) t(p) + u(p)
\

\begin{equation}
\tilde{s} (p) \equiv - \eta(\lambda) + (1 - K(p)) \left( \frac{\ep(\lambda)
m^2}{p^2 + m^2} + \eta (\lambda) \right) + K(p) t(p) + u(p)
\

\begin{equation}
m^2 (\Delta t) \equiv m^2 \left( 1 + \Delta t (2 + \tilde{\beta}_m
(\lambda) \right),\quad
\lambda (\Delta t) \equiv \lambda + \Delta t ~\tilde{\beta} (\lambda)
\

\begin{equation}
\V_{2n} (t; p_1, \cdots, p_{2n}; m^2, \lambda) = \V_{2n} (0; p_1,
\cdots, p_{2n}; m^2 (t), \lambda (t))
\

\begin{equation}
u^{(1)}(p; m^2) = \frac{m^2}{p^2 + m^2} \left( \beta_m^{(1)} \int_0^\infty
dt\, \delta K(p \e^{-t}) + \ep^{(1)} (1 - K(p)) \right)
\

\begin{equation}
t^{(2)} (p) = \beta_m^{(1)} \left( \frac{m^2}{p^2+m^2}\right)^2 \left(
\beta_m^{(1)} \int_0^\infty dt' \int_0^\infty dt \, \delta K(p
\e^{-\tpt}) + \ep^{(1)} \int_0^\infty dt (1 - K(p \e^{-t})) \right)
\

\begin{equation}
\tilde{s} (p) \equiv - \eta + (1 - K(p))
\left( \frac{\ep m^2}{p^2 + m^2} + \eta \right)  + K(p) t(p) + u(p)
\

\begin{equation}

m^2}{p^2 + m^2} + \eta (\lambda) \right) + K(p) t(p) + u(p)
\

\begin{equation}
m^2 (\Delta t) \equiv m^2 \left( 1 + \Delta t (2 + \tilde{\beta}_m
(\lambda) \right),\quad
\lambda (\Delta t) \equiv \lambda + \Delta t ~\tilde{\beta} (\lambda)
\

\begin{equation}
\V_{2n} (t; p_1, \cdots, p_{2n}; m^2, \lambda) = \V_{2n} (0; p_1,
\cdots, p_{2n}; m^2 (t), \lambda (t))
\

\begin{equation}
u^{(1)}(p; m^2) = \frac{m^2}{p^2 + m^2} \left( \beta_m^{(1)} \int_0^\infty
dt\, \delta K(p \e^{-t}) + \ep^{(1)} (1 - K(p)) \right)
\

\begin{equation}
t^{(2)} (p) = \beta_m^{(1)} \left( \frac{m^2}{p^2+m^2}\right)^2 \left(
\beta_m^{(1)} \int_0^\infty dt' \int_0^\infty dt \, \delta K(p
